member.name: T:VL.Core.EventBridge
member.summary: Contains helper functions to turn .NET events into observables.

member.name: M:VL.Core.EventBridge.FromEventPattern(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Same as Observable.FromEventPattern but caches the resulting observable sequence for the given type and event name.

member.name: M:VL.Core.EventBridge.FromEventPattern(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Same as Observable.FromEventPattern but caches the resulting observable sequence for the given target object and event name.

member.name: M:VL.Core.EventBridge.FromEventPattern``1(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Same as Observable.FromEventPattern but caches the resulting observable sequence for the given type and event name.

member.name: M:VL.Core.EventBridge.FromEventPattern``1(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Same as Observable.FromEventPattern but caches the resulting observable sequence for the given target object and event name.

member.name: T:VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapped
member.summary: Allows objects to get notified when they've been hot swapped.

member.name: M:VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapped.Swapped(System.Object)
member.summary: Called after the object has been replaced by a new instance.

member.name: T:VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapImminent
member.summary: Allows objects which are currently running in the runtime graph to get notified before a hot swap takes place.

member.name: M:VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapImminent.HotSwapImminent
member.summary: Called right before a hot swap will take place.

member.name: T:VL.Core.HotSwapAttribute
member.summary: Forces the hot swapper to call the constructor of this type and only swap fields which also have this attribute set.

member.name: T:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph
member.summary: A collection of methods used by nodes which introduce new entry points into the VL runtime graph.

member.name: M:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.Enter(VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapImminent)
member.summary: Call when entering the VL runtime graph. Must be followed by a call to Exit.
member.param: The instance which enters the runtime graph.

member.name: M:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.Exit(VL.Core.INotifyHotSwapImminent)
member.summary: Call when leaving the VL runtime graph. Must be preceded by a call to Enter.

member.name: M:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.Pause(System.Int32)
member.summary: Stops instances from entering the VL runtime graph. Must be followed by a call to Continue.
member.param: The time in milli seconds to wait for instances to leave the graph.
member.returns: True if no more instances are executing inside the graph.

member.name: M:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.Continue
member.summary: Continues execution. Must be preceded by a call to Pause.

member.name: P:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.OnHold
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not entering in the VL runtime graph is allowed. If true Enter calls will block until set to false.

member.name: M:VL.Core.RuntimeGraph.GetRunningInstances
member.summary: Gets the instances currently running inside the VL runtime graph.

member.name: T:VL.Core.Properties.Settings
member.summary: Global HDE settings

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.NodeShowImplementationIcon
member.summary: Show the icon for a nodes implementation (patch/code) even for nodes that are not in the "Main" namespace

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.NodeShowType
member.summary: Show a types name in MemberOperation nodes

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.PropertyShowCollectionIcon
member.summary: Display the collection icon for properties whose type is a collection

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.PropertyShowMutableIcon
member.summary: Display the mutable icon for properties whose type is mutable

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.RuntimeSupport
member.summary: When enabled values as well as timing information can be inspected at runtime. Has minor impact on performance however.

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.TooltipShowDocumentation
member.summary: Display code documentation

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.TooltipShowLocalID
member.summary: Display an items localID

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.TooltipShowOperation
member.summary: Display the Operation an item is part of

member.name: P:VL.Core.Properties.Settings.MouseWheelZooms
member.summary: Mouse wheel zooms, + ALT pans vertically, + SHIFT pans horizontally. Otherwise mouse wheel pans vertically, + CTRL zooms

member.summary: The time when the current frame started

member.summary: Creates a new enum value of given type

member.summary: Sets the selected item to the value at the index in the entries list of its definition. If the index is out of range, returns false and the input value.

member.summary: Can be used in subclass to create the default, selects the first entry.

member.summary: Sorts the elements in the entire spread builder using the specified comparer function

member.summary: Creates a spread builder with the same contents as this spread that can be efficiently modified across multiple operations

member.summary: Whether or not the spread is empty

member.summary: Returns the number of slices in the spread

member.summary: Searches for the specified item and returns the index of the first occurrence

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Collections.Spread`1.Pin
member.summary: Pins the internal data array of the spread on the garbage collector to access it from unmanaged code. Use at your own risk, i.e. never modify bytes in it. Also make sure Unpin gets called to avoid memory leaks.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Collections.Spread`1.Unpin
member.summary: Frees the pinned garbage collector handle, if allocated.

member.name: T:VL.Lib.Collections.Spread
member.summary: Contains all those methods which are used in C# and VL. Methods which are only used in VL reside in SpreadNodes.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Collections.Spread.SizeInBytes``1(VL.Lib.Collections.Spread{``0})
member.summary: The size in bytes = element type size * count. Returns IntPtr * count for reference types.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Collections.Spread.GetInternalArray``1(VL.Lib.Collections.Spread{``0})
member.summary: Gets the internal data array of the spread, use at your own risk, i.e. never modify it.
